name: A bonesplint cinch
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'rage'.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'battlecry'.
There is a small mechanism embedded in the cinch that can be activated
